data.title: Dragon's Kin **Signed** by McCaffrey, Anne; McCaffrey, Todd: Fine Hardcover (2003) First Edition, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780345461988 - Signed by Author(s) - First Edition - Hardcover - Ballantine Books, New York - 2003 - Condition: Fine - Fine - Signed by Todd McCaffrey on title page - Signature only - received in person. First edition, First printing. With corresponding number line. Novel of Pern Book is in Fine condition. Boards are clean, not bumped. Interior is clean and legible. Not remaindered. Dust Jacket is in Fine condition. Not price clipped. Is covered by Mylar Brodart. All-ways well boxed, All-ways fast service. Thanks. - Dragon's Kin **Signed**
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Nevada sales tax Please advise resale card information upon ordering.

VISA and MASTERCARD handled through ABE PAYPAL accepted.

Books may be returned if not as described within 14 days of receipt.

Books may be reserved by Phone or email

and will be held for one week pending receipt of payment.

Inquiries / orders can be sent

by Email - Allwaysfiction@msn.com

BOOK DESCRIPTIONS: Are made to the best of my ability at time of listing,

any questions please feel free to ask before ordering.

DEALER DISCO...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.

Shipments for paperback may use padded envelopes. Shipments on Hardback books are sent by sturdy box with appropriate wrapping for protection
